p: For Simplexa™ COVID-19 Direct assay, one vial of Reaction Mix was thawed for each sample. Respiratory samples were collected with a flexible nasopharyngeal nylon flocked swabs (FLOQSwabs™, Copan Italia, Brescia, Italy) dipped in 2–3 mL universal transport medium (UTM™, Copan Italia). After swirling, the swab was discarded and 50 μL of sample and 50 μL of Reaction Mix were added to their specific wells on a direct amplification disk, which was loaded onto the LIAISON® MDX instrument (DiaSorin). For BAL, a pre-treatement with 1:1 SV40 Sputagest Selectavial (Mast Diagnostic GmbH, Reinfeld, Germany) was performed.
